quote: Growth comes at the point of resistance. – Josh Waitzkin
fact: There are only four words in the English language which end in "dous": tremendous, horrendous, stupendous, and  hazardous.
joke: Why does a chicken coop only have two doors? Because if it had four doors it would be a chicken sedan.
